title: Something up with the servers?
body: Is oce server down for everyone?

replies.body:
It seems like the server was indeed having issues around this time; however, the issue also seems to now be resolved.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JElgLUkn,comment-id=00110002,timestamp=2018-11-09T09:30:13.672+0000)
> 
> UPDATE 2: Engineers believe we may have resolved the issue and we've not seen any new reports of this problem come in for a while now. If you're still experiencing the 003 error or are stuck at patching/installing, please [lodge a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with player support if you've not done so already.
No, mine working fine. Just restart your client and it should be good to go :){{champion:157}}
